Detailed Description

cvmx_dpi_dma_pp::_cnt

DPI_DMA_PP[0..3]_CNT = DMA per PP Instr Done Counter When DMA Instruction Completion Interrupt Mode DPI_DMA_CONTROL.DICI_MODE is enabled, every dma instruction that has the WQP=0 and a PTR value of 1..4 will incremrement DPI_DMA_PPx_CNT value-1 counter. Instructions with WQP=0 and PTR values higher then 0x3F will still send a zero byte write. Hardware reserves that values 5..63 for future use and will treat them as a PTR of 0 and do nothing.
